generator: 1 { selected_cpu(C) : cpu(C) } 1. 1 { selected_gpu(G) : gpu(G) } 1. 1 { selected_storage(S) : storage(S) } 1. selected(X) :- selected_cpu(X). selected(X) :- selected_gpu(X). selected(X) :- selected_storage(X).

hard_constraints.description: Our policy dictates that the component requiring the largest financial investment must also demonstrate the highest performance rating to justify the expenditure.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: max_selected_cost(V) :- V = #max { VC : selected(X), cost(X, VC) }. max_selected_perf(V) :- V = #max { VP : selected(X), perf(X, VP) }. :- selected(C), cost(C, V), max_selected_cost(V), perf(C, P), max_selected_perf(MP), P < MP.

hard_constraints.description: To ensure compliance with procurement guidelines, we must avoid over-specified builds; therefore, selecting the top-performing item in all three categories simultaneously is strictly prohibited.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: is_top(C) :- cpu(C), perf(C, V), V = #max { VP : cpu(X), perf(X, VP) }. is_top(C) :- gpu(C), perf(C, V), V = #max { VP : gpu(X), perf(X, VP) }. is_top(C) :- storage(C), perf(C, V), V = #max { VP : storage(X), perf(X, VP) }. :- selected_cpu(C), is_top(C), selected_gpu(G), is_top(G), selected_storage(S), is_top(S).

hard_constraints.description: Technical standards require that the graphics processor performance score does not exceed that of the central processing unit.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- selected_gpu(G), selected_cpu(C), perf(G, PG), perf(C, PC), PG > PC.

hard_constraints.description: IT support has flagged a compatibility issue; the Alpha8 CPU and NovaX GPU cannot be used in the same configuration due to BIOS limitations.
Inventory rules state that the FusionDrive unit is exclusively reserved for configurations featuring the ZetaCore processor.

soft_constraints.description: Financial audits require that the cost variance between any two selected components does not exceed $250 to maintain budget balance.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: penalty("CostImbalance", (C1, C2), 1) :- selected(C1), selected(C2), cost(C1, V1), cost(C2, V2), V1 - V2 > 250.

global_objective: #minimize { Cost, Name, Tuple : penalty(Name, Tuple, Cost) }.
